item.title: Buy Assassin's Creed® Freedom Cry from the Humble Store
item.description:
Buy Assassin's Creed® Freedom Cry from the Humble Store

SummaryBorn a slave, Adewale found freedom as a pirate aboard Edward Kenway's ship, the Jackdaw. 15 years later, Adewale has become a trained Assassin who finds himself shipwrecked in Saint-Domingue without weapons or crew. He now has to acquire a ship and gather his own crew to free the slaves and avenge them.

item.title: Buy Assassin's Creed® Liberation HD from the Humble Store
item.description:
Buy Assassin's Creed® Liberation HD from the Humble Store

The year is 1765. While the seeds of the American Revolution are being sown in Boston and New York, Spanish forces in the South plot to seize control of Louisiana for the Templars, threatening to forever shift the balance of power in the New World.

item.title: Buy Assassin's Creed® Chronicles: China from the Humble Store
item.description:
Buy Assassin's Creed® Chronicles: China from the Humble Store

Follow three legendary Assassins on journeys of Revenge, Retribution and Redemption A thrilling new saga in the Assassin's Creed Universe, Assassin's Creed Chronicles take players to three distinct civilizations and time periods throughout history: the start of the Ming Dynasty crumble, the Sikh Empire going at war in India and the aftermath of Red October revolution.

item.title: My so-manieth "One and Only" show!
item.description:
My so-manieth "One and Only" show!

Mary, Queen of Scots, faces political and sexual intrigue in the treacherous world of the French court.

item.title: Another one of the shows I'm currently watching - also started reading the book!
item.description:
Another one of the shows I'm currently watching - also started reading the book!

Costume Designer Terry Dresbach is married to producer Ron Moore. She and Co-producer, Maril Davis, suggested the books to Moore to produce as a TV show.

item.title: Hope it comes back soon, such a good show!
item.description:
Hope it comes back soon, such a good show!

An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.

item.title: Last episode was good!
item.description:
Last episode was good!

The doctors of Seattle Grace Hospital are always fighting for something, from access to cutting-edge surgeries to relationships to patients' lives. And they don't always win.

item.title: Wish I could afford it!
item.description:
Wish I could afford it!

All five downloadable content pack: The Hidden Secrets Pack The Battle Hardened Pack Tyranny of King Washington: The Infamy Tyranny of King Washington: The Betrayal Tyranny of King Washington: The Redemption 4 bonus single-player missions, adding over an hour of additional gameplay The official Assassin's Creed® III soundtrack (mp3 files) George Washington's notebook (pdf file) The American Colonies, 1775.
